name: Grave: Open World Survival Horror
blurb: Grave is an open-world, surrealist survival horror experience set in a constantly changing reality.

rewards.reward: No Reward
CREDIT AND GRAVE DEMO. Your name in the credits as a supporter, plus immediate access to the game demo once the Kickstarter completes.

EARLY BACKER DIGITAL COPY OF GRAVE STORY MODE. Get the story mode only, DRM free version of the game at this early backer cost.

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.

REGULAR PRICE DIGITAL COPY OF GRAVE STORY MODE. The story mode only version of the game, DRM free, at regular price.

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.

EARLY BACKER FULL GAME WITH "SURVIVE THE NIGHT" MODE. Test your survival abilities with the added never-ending Survival Mode, featuring all the play mechanics and exploration of the main game but in an increasingly challenging, procedural playground. Completely DRM free.

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.

REGULAR PRICE FULL GAME WITH "SURVIVE THE NIGHT" MODE. Get the game plus the procedural "Survive the Night" mode at its regular price and DRM free.
============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.

SPECIAL EDITION WITH DIGITAL ART BOOK, SOUNDTRACK AND "MAKING OF GRAVE" VIDEO SERIES. We'll provide you with a collection of all our production art, including concepts, early assets, details about our creative process and tons of development insights.

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
DRM free copy of the game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the campaign ends, your name in the credits.

BETA EDITION. Get access to the beta before the game is released. Help us test the game and play the game early, plus get your full release digital copy when the game is completed.

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, DRM free copy of the game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.

SWAG EDITION: GAME + GRAVE T-SHIRT AND POSTER, CUSTOM-MADE GRAVE POSTCARD. Pick your favorite design for the Grave T-shirt and poster, plus then show off the swag to your friends. Every backer in this tier or above gets their own unique postcard with an image no other backer will receive.

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, full game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.

SPECIAL EDITION: GAME WITH BETA ACCESS + GRAVE T-SHIRT AND POSTER, CUSTOM-MADE GRAVE POSTCARD. For the backer who wants to play the game early AND get the swag. More exclusive but worth it.

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, full game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.

PHYSICAL EDITION: PHYSICAL COPY OF GRAVE + 3 DRM FREE DIGITAL COPIES, PHYSICAL ART BOOK SIGNED BY THE DEVELOPERS. The definitive version of Grave, for the collectors who want it all. Plus you will also get a custom art piece made just for you by our lead artist!

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Physical copy of grave, 1 poster and 2 t-shirts, signed physical art book, digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, 3 DRM free digital copies of the game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.

ULTIMATE EDITION WITH ALPHA ACCESS: Includes everything in the premium edition, plus beta AND alpha access, with 4 additional digital copies to share with your friends, all DRM free. Play the game while most people are still waiting, and enjoy your pile of swag while you do it.

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Beta access, physical copy of Grave, 2 posters and 2 t-shirts, 2 custom postcards, signed physical art book, digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, 5 DRM free digital copies of the game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.

YOUR IMAGE OR VOICE IN GRAVE - DIGITAL ONLY. The world is filled with supernatural images and electronic voice phenomena. Be a part of the horror and send a ghostly message to players by pledging to this tier.

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Beta/alpha access, digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, 7 DRM free digital copies of the game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.

YOUR IMAGE OR VOICE IN GRAVE. The world is filled with supernatural images and electronic voice phenomena. Be a part of the horror and send a ghostly message to players by pledging to this tier.

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Beta access, physical copy of Grave, 2 posters and 2 t-shirts, 3 custom postcards, signed physical art book, digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, 7 DRM free digital copies of the game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.

BECOME A 3D GHOST IN GRAVE - DIGITAL ONLY. Make this generous pledge and we will use photos of you as reference to create a fully 3D representation of you in the game. Some games say they can put you "in" the game, but we really mean it.

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Beta/alpha access, digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, 10 DRM free digital copies of the game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.
NOTE: Does not include any physical items

BECOME A 3D GHOST IN GRAVE. Make this generous pledge and we will use photos of you as reference to create a fully 3D representation of you in the game. Some games say they can put you "in" the game, but we really mean it.

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Beta access, physical copy of Grave, one of each poster and t-shirt, 5 custom postcards, signed physical art book, digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, 10 DRM free digital copies of the game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.

DESIGN YOUR OWN MONSTER FOR GRAVE - DIGITAL ONLY. We'll work with you to create your own creature that will appear in Grave. You will help us design the look, concept and behavior of this creature that will be integrated. We will have to do some balancing and make sure it fits well into the game, but you will be able to play a major role in bringing an all-new creature to life in Grave.
============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Beta/alpha access, digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, 10 DRM free digital copies of the game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.
NOTE: Does not include any physical items

DESIGN YOUR OWN MONSTER FOR GRAVE. We'll work with you to create your own creature that will appear in Grave. You will help us design the look, concept and behavior of this creature that will be integrated. We will have to do some balancing and make sure it fits well into the game, but you will be able to play a major role in bringing an all-new creature to life in Grave. ============================== ----------------- Includes: ------------------ ============================== Beta access, physical copy of Grave, 2 of each poster and t-shirt design, 10 custom postcards, signed physical art book, Digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, 10 DRM free digital copies of the game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the campaign ends, your name in the credits as a Creature Creator.

BECOME A DESIGNER FOR A WEEK - DIGITAL ONLY. We'll bring you onto the team for a week, where you'll be able to play a major role in helping us shape the game experience. You'll join our meetings, be able to play our in-progress builds and help us with play balance, we'll give you access to our production documentation and assets, and give you a bunch of insight about our process and the job of a designer on Grave. You will have a whole week dedicated to YOU, so each person in this tier will get their own. That way, you can get the most access to the developers possible! 
============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Beta/alpha access, digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, 10 DRM free digital copies of the game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.
NOTE: Does not include any physical items

BECOME A DESIGNER FOR A WEEK! We'll bring you onto the team for a week, where you'll be able to play a major role in helping us shape the game experience. You'll join our meetings, be able to play our in-progress builds and help us with play balance, we'll give you access to our production documentation and assets, and give you a bunch of insight about our process and the job of a designer on Grave. You will have a whole week dedicated to YOU, so each person in this tier will get their own. That way, you can get the most access to the developers possible!\r\n============================== ----------------- Includes: ------------------ ============================== Beta access, physical copy of Grave, 2 of each poster and t-shirt design, 10 custom postcards, signed physical art book, Digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, 10 DRM free digital copies of the game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the campaign ends, your name in the credits as a Junior Designer.

GRAVE HALLOWEEN PARTY PLUS. We'll fly you down to Arizona for a special Grave Halloween party and early game showing. Schmooze with the developers and the local Phoenix game dev community, and get an early chance to play the game at the event. All previous reward tiers are included, plus your name as a Producer in the credits.

============================== -----------------
Includes: 
------------------
==============================
Beta access, physical copy of Grave, 2 of each poster and t-shirt design, 10 custom postcards, signed physical art book, Digital art book and soundtrack, "Making of Grave" documentary, 10 DRM free digital copies of the game + "Survive The Night" mode, Grave demo as soon as the  campaign ends, your name in the credits.
